Detailed Description

Class implementing the SFOP detector.

The constructor loads an image file. The function detect() builds the SFOP scale space and detects local maxima. Furthermore it filters features w.r.t. their precision and the smaller eigenvalue of the structure tensor. Given a value for the expected image noise this filtering step is realized in a statistically motivated manner. During a non-maxima suppression step dense feature cluster will be reduced to the most precise feature.

const double  f_a 
) [static]

Incomplete gamma function.

Parameters:
[in]f_xInput parameter X
[in]f_aInput parameter A
Returns:
Result is defined as 1 / gamma(a) * integral from 0 to x of t^(a-1) exp(-t) dt
